attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sack Ministers who have exploited lax expence/allowance rules to avoid paying tax of any kind and to play the property market and or enhance their own properties at taxpayers expense. The government cannot allow cheats to set rules for others.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
